column6:
When the Green Goblin swears to destroy the Hobgoblin for stealing his shtick, only Spider-Man can save the city from World War "G"-- but with his new black costume, crooks and citizens alike don't know if he's a new hero, a new villain or the same old Spidey!,2006,12
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | penciller:Cory Hamscher | penciller (cover):Patrick Scherberger | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Fred Van Lente
